TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Lucius_Allen, title = Lucius_Allen, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lucius_Allen} }

S.FORM: == Lucius Allen == 9 bulad 26 demiad, 1947 a mihca, Lucius Allen, miunduay. Lucius Allen nalecuhan i Kansas City, Kansas, nanu syubay kanas-mali miunduay nu Amilika NBA nisakaput, pahanhanan tu kawaw ayza. Lucius Allen i 1969 a mihcan NBA sapapili' mimaliay a kawaw, saka 1 ku uwac atu silsil 3, namapili' tu nu Seattle SuperSonics putiput.

== Locios Allen == 9 bolad 26 demiad, 1947 a mihca, Locios Allen, miondoay. Locios Allen nalecohan i Kansas City, Kansas, nano syobay kanas-mali miondoay no Amilika NBA nisakapot, pahanhanan to kawaw ayza. Locios Allen i 1969 a mihcan NBA sapapili' mimaliay a kawaw, saka 1 ko owac ato silsil 3, namapili' to no Seattle SoperSonics potipot.
